title: Air France-KLM CEO Is Upbeat About Transatlantic Routes
description: Air France-KLM CEO Ben Smith speaks exclusively to Bloomberg News after they reported better-than-expected earnings in the fourth quarter and remains upbeat about the North Atlantic routes despite heightened geopolitical tensions. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Air France-KLM CEO Ben Smith speaks exclusively to Bloomberg News after they reported better-than-expected earnings in the fourth quarter and remains upbeat about the North Atlantic routes despite heightened geopolitical tensions. (Source: Bloomberg)
